title: MoHR releases film to create awareness about FIR
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 7 (APP):Ministry of Human Rights on Monday released a film to create awareness among masses about the importance of registering an First Information Report (FIR).
In a Twitter message issued by MoHR here , the film would highlight the importance of registering of an FIR.
The film encouraged women to report FIR regarding the crimes through the proper and correct channels
